item.description:
Welcome back Daniella and to newbie Barbara :) Hope you enjoyed cribbage with us and will be returning again and again and again - Even when you are NOT new I still love skunking y'all :)

AND a hearty CONGRATs to Joe who now has a job and can stay with us :) AND who just got initiated by Capt'n Bette to reverse cribbage and who was laughing (LOL) about it as it is a fun game especially when you have to unlearn everything you know about Cribbage :) as did Karen as well as Emad, who forgot to show up last night :( and was missed by ALL. I don't think we even noticed that Gabe wasn't there as he had SKUNK FLU ! ! ! and of course Susan is still away in Maine...

Larry, David and I had some G*R*E*A*T games, I beat them both twice I am sure :) even tho they were trying to gang up on me and Larry was WAY WAY ahead and blanks out on fourth street (yuck yuck).

Debbie skunked me :( :( boo hoo and then proceeded to beat me up on the second game too :( :(
BUT, she had a great F*U*N 'card Yankee Swap' that we will be doing on January 5th to start the New Year off with a BANG!!!! AND it will be only 1 day after my 69th birthday :) SO YOU ALL BETTER BE ATTENDING as I will be baking my own birthday cake to celebrate along with the 'card Yankee Swap' for this F*U*N Festive Occasion :)

Next meet up will be December 15th and I will be away on a cruise to the Caribbean (oh poor me) and we will also be playing on December 29, and will pick up the NEW YEAR on January 5, 2010.

Happy Turkey Day to Y'ALL ! ! and you too Vegan Joe ! !

ME :) :)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our Cribbage Boards out for ALL to find :)
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet Up - Welcome to December 2009
